videotemplate_discussion_question2::eval: Does your story offer good ideas about how to handle the issue?
videotemplate_discussion_question2::text: Discussions are framed around asking many people the same question. This template investigates what can be done about a specific issue. Discussions work well for investigating issues with a strong cultural or social significance. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
If you get a bad answer, it's smart to try again with a new clip.
videotemplate_discussion_question2::clip: Show where people are affected by the issue.
What do you think should be done about the issue?
Show us something that introduces the issue.
videotemplate_discussion_question2::text: Talk to different people for each clip to give your story a range of voices. You may want to substitute the name of the event you are focused on where you see \“the event.\”
